about_the_game:
Step into a world of glass castles and horses of steel. Dracula has been resurrected in modern nights Los Angeles. Separated from his home by oceans and time itself, he must come to grips with a new world while his survival hangs in the balance.

 

The New Order of the Dragon has brought Dracula back from his second death with a long-forgotten ritual from the forbidden tomes of Scholomance but things are not all that they seem.

 

In Hollywood, yet another adaption of Bram Stoker’s novel is being made, and Dracula must come to terms with the unexpected fame that the author has bestowed upon him.

 

Experience 'Harrowed World: Dracula Fallen' through two distinct character paths.

 

Assume the mantle of the ancient undead warlord taking on the world of today in Dracula's Path.

 

Explore Los Angeles through eyes of a modern vampire and become the leader of the New Order of the Dragon in Carmen's Path.

  • Voice Acting.

  • Take advantage of feeding opportunities.

  • Use vampiric abilities.

  • Internal Achievements System.

  • Lexicon System.

  • Dracula's Path Duration: TBD.

  • Carmen's Path Duration: TBD.

  • Controller Support (partially tested).

  • Designed to be played multiple times.

  • Unravel captivating layers of lore.

  • Uncover multiple different endings.

  • Mac and Linux Support (untested).

A dark and twisted version of our world, where the supernatural exists just below the surface. Vampires, magical folk, and other beings exist in a constant struggle for power and influence. Through sinister cabals and insatiable corporate empires these creatures hold sway over human society.

Ordinary people live in blissful ignorance of the dark forces at work around them. Follow these supernatural beings through a grim dystopian atmosphere filled with gothic horror and a tangled web of morality where peril lurks around every corner.

content_descriptors.notes: This title may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work, like frequent violence or gore. Some players may find elements of the game’s story and characters uncomfortable. This title is not suitable for those who are easily offended by such content.
